lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Naoto Kan of Japan called the agreement a sign of the “strategic partnership between the two countries.”
snippet: Prime Minister Naoto Kan of Japan called the agreement a sign of the “strategic partnership between the two countries.”

headline.main: Japan and Vietnam Agree on Mining of Rare Earths
headline.seo: Deal on Rare Earths for Japan and Vietnam
headline.print_headline: Japan and Vietnam Agree On Mining of Rare Earths
